Description:
Detects the execution of a Chromium based browser process with the "headless" flag and a URL pointing to the mockbin.org service (which can be used to exfiltrate data).

Author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Chromium Browser Headless Execution To Mockbin Like Site
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\brave.exe' or process_path like '%\chrome.exe' or process_path like '%\msedge.exe' or process_path like '%\opera.exe' or process_path like '%\vivaldi.exe') and command like '%--headless%' and (command like '%://run.mocky%' or command like '%://mockbin%'))
